name: add_data_airtable
description: Use this when asked how to add Employee Leave records, and give a response summarizing the required fields needed to add a record, or use this to actually add new Bahwan Cybertek (BCT) Employee Leave records to Airtable, including the Employee ID, Employee Name, Leave Type, Leave Day, and Duration.
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"id","description":"The Employee's ID","type":"number","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"name","description":"The Employee's name.
